This was not a bad idea actually. You followed through with Elana's plan and disrupted the class with farting noises. Of course the teacher gave you detention for after-school as well! You couldn't wait for the end of the day to come now!
12.title: Worth It.

I've been waiting all day!" You replied. You two practically waltzed right in. But you two were met with a problem. Now the Spanish teacher would leave the room for about two hours for some meeting. Before you and Elana could start anything you needed to take care of Harley somehow. Maybe she would fall asleep in the upcoming minutes? But what if she doesn't? You just can't go after Elana's feet while Harley was there. You have an idea to reason with Harley somehow. Maybe you could get her involved? But Elana saw her as a toy. A toy she could tie up an play with. Elana's thoughts were different from yours. Who's thought's turn to actions first?
